column8: Turn my back and slam the door
column11: The snow glows white on the mountain tonight
column12: Not a footprint to be seen
column14: And it looks like I'm the queen
column15: The wind is howling like the swirling storm inside
column16: Couldnt keep it in,, heaven knows I tried
column19: Dont let them in,, dont let them see
column32: Turn my back and slam the door
column33: And here I stand,, and here I'll stay
column36: The cold never bothered me anyway
column41: And the fears that once controlled me
column42: Cant get to me at all
column43: Up here in the cold thin air
column45: I know left a life behind
column46: But Im too relieved to grieve
column51: Standing frozen in the life Ive chosen
column52: You won't find me,, the past is so behind me
